Package models

Class Assistant

java.lang.Object
models.BaseModel
models.Assistant
public class Assistant
extends BaseModel
Assistant object is defined as follows:
  • A COVID-19 test assistant is someone related to the university (staff or student) who is volunteering to perform COVID tests.
  • To register an assistant in the system, you need their university email and a non-blank name.
  • The email must be unique and follow the pattern “*@uok.ac.uk”.
  • Print template: | name | email |

    • checkEmail

      public static java.lang.Boolean checkEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Uses Regexp to make sure that both the prefix of the email, and the suffix are valid
      Returns:
      True if email is valid

    • checkOnShift

      public boolean checkOnShift​(TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Since an Assistant is on shift for a whole day (3 time slots by default) we can simply just compare the days of each time slot instead of each individual time slot on each day
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to check if the Assistant is on duty for
      Returns:
      True if the assistant is on shift during that time slot

    • checkAvailability

      public boolean checkAvailability​(TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to check availability for
      Returns:
      True if the Assistant is available for that time slot
